Text:
[L]Praise be to God the Father, he wanted, through his eternal word, to make his chosen people reborn from an incorruptible seed. Let us ask together in Faith
	*Lord, show favor to your people*
[L]Hear us, merciful God, the prayers which we offer in favor for all your people,
[T]That we prefer the satisfaction of your word rather than bread.
[L]Teach us, all who are inclined to love, to have an effective and genuine love for your creation and for all people without exception.
[T]Building towards everlasting good will and peace.
Look at all those regenerated by baptism,
[T]Consecrate them to yourself, making them living stones in the temple of your Spirit.**
That many, in the way of Jonahs preaching to the Ninevites, repent in their youth,
[T]by your word, touch and convert their hearts.**
[T]Lord, show favor to your people
[L}Grant the dying to go with hope to meet Christ their judge,
[T]and to enjoy your presence forever. **
